participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Creative and adventurous, loves exploring new things and taking risks.
participant_1.background: I don't care what color my hair is as long as I can keep acting. I am saving up to buy a new camera. I've learned to live without my dad. I play music in my spare time. I never told my parents about my deployment, but I would tell my friends all about it if I was famous.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Playful and ironic, enjoys humor and has a laid-back attitude towards life.
participant_2.background: I used to wear my brother's hand-me-downs when I was younger. I drink diet coke. I grew up with my parents and siblings. Sometimes I listen to Gary Jules to be ironic. I love sharks.

content.text: Hey, I see you're from the Bay Area?
Yup! How did you know?
You mentioned sharks, and I knew it was a Bay Area thing.
Haha, yeah, I love sharks.
Have you ever been swimming with them?
No, I'm too scared, but I'd love to try it.
I'm sure you'd be great at it!
Thanks! I don't know about that, but I'd like to try.
What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but I'm really into Gary Jules right now.
Gary Jules? Oh, I've never heard of him.
He's a really good singer-songwriter. You should check him out.
I will, thanks for the recommendation.
No problem!
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to play music, go to concerts, and hang out with friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun.
Yeah, it is.
I like to go to concerts too.
Oh, that's awesome! What kind of music do you like to see?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I'm mostly into rock and indie.
Oh, cool. I like a lot of different types of music too, but I'm mostly into alternative rock and indie rock.
That's awesome! Do you have any favorite bands?
Yeah, I have a lot of favorite bands, but my favorites are The Killers, The Strokes, and The Arctic Monkeys.
Oh, I love The Killers! They're one of my favorite bands too.
Oh, that's awesome! We should go to a concert together sometime.
That would be fun
